ModMetaData.name: RimFantasy - Medieval Overhaul Edition
ModMetaData.author: Sierra
ModMetaData.description:
[h1]Mod Version: v1.2[/h1] [h1][i]This version of RimFantasy has been reworked and rebalanced to adhere to [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2553700067]Medieval Overhaul[/url] standards. It is no longer modular and contains new/altered/removed content.[/i][/h1]
For the longest time, civilizations dismissed magic as wild fantasies and superstitious tribal beliefs. That is until one day, an incident occurred in a gemstone mine, which led to the discovery that gemstones have a natural affinity with magic, and could be imbued with magical energies to produce spectacular effects.
Since then, the value of gemstones reached unimaginable heights and can be commonly found in the most prosperous cities and in the hands of the most skilled warriors.
[b]Features:[/b] [list] [*]Magical weapons with powers. [*]Magical furniture for lighting areas. [*]Magical furniture for regulating temperature. [*]Magical defences for protecting colonies. [/list]
[b]Required Mods:[/b] [list] [*][url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2553700067]Medieval Overhaul[/url]
[b]Recommended Mods:[/b] [list] [*][url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2903293603]RimFantasy - House Doyle[/url] - [i]Official RimFantasy AddOn. Adds player craftable house armor plus a new line of Arcane Weapons.[/i] [*][url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2646321064]Medieval Empire Overhaul[/url] - [i]Requires Medieval Overhaul. Changes Empire faction from Spacer to Medieval.[/i]
[*][url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1916352291]RimTraits - Medieval Talent[/url] [*][url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2206957172]RimTraits - General Traits[/url] [*][url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2244594116]RimTraits - Vanilla Trait Colors[/url] [*][url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2595980371]Milkshakes - Digital Deluxe Edition[/url] [/list]
[b]Compatibility:[/b] [list] [*]Save Game Compatible [*][b][Incompatible - RimFantasy (Original Series)][/b] The Medieval Overhaul Edition supersedes the original series for usage with Medieval Overhaul. Will cause game breaking issues if used together. [*][b][Moderate Incompatibility - Simple Sidearms][/b] Overrides the way bladelink weapons work and breaks the no-bond mechanics of arcane weapons. "Allow use of blocked weapons" can be turned on in settings as a workaround. [/list]

[h1]Latest Changes:[/h1] [b]v1.2[/b] [list] [*][DEV] Updated texPath for all Arcane Weapons. [*][New] Added Arcane Halberds (Emerald/Sapphire/Ruby). [*][Changed] Magic fire will now spread 2.5x slower. [*][Removed] Drain traits will no longer spawn on new Emerald/Sapphire/Ruby Arcane Weapons. Existing weapons are unaffected. [/list]
